Text: Future Awards InviteIMAGEThe University of Houstons Center for Entrepreneurship Innovation CEI is hosting the th Annual Future Luncheon Awards which gathers over of Houstons top entrepreneurs and business leaders This is an excellent opportunity for companies to tap into the CEI network including VCs Investment Bankers Bankers CEOs and Houstons leading business organizations Attached you will find an invitation to the luncheon If you have any questions please do not hesitate to call or email We look forward to seeing you there Jesse Schwarz Program Manager Tel IMAGE We request your presence at the Future Awards Luncheon Celebrating the Past Present and Future of Entrepreneurship Thursday August Registration AM Lunch Noon PM Hyatt Regency Hotel Downtown Corporate Table Please contact CEI for additional details and Table reservations Gray Logo smalljpg Future Smalljpg
